pkgmetadata.longdescription: Robust Backfitting // A robust backfitting algorithm for additive models based on (robust) local polynomial kernel smoothers. It includes both bounded and re-descending (kernel) M-estimators, and it computes predictions for points outside the training set if desired. See Boente, Martinez and Salibian-Barrera (2017) doi:10.1080/10485252.2017.1369077 and Martinez and Salibian- Barrera (2021) doi:10.21105/joss.02992 for details.
